name: Vegetable Fried Rice
instructions: Stir fry leftover rice with mixed vegetables, soy sauce, and garlic.

name: Rice Pudding (Kheer)
instructions: Simmer rice with milk, sugar, and cardamom for a sweet dessert.

name: Dal Paratha
instructions: Knead leftover dal into dough with whole wheat flour and spices to make parathas.

name: Dal Soup
instructions: Thin out the dal with vegetable stock, add fresh herbs and lemon for a soup.

name: Bread Upma
instructions: Cube the bread and toss with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and onions.

name: Bread Pudding
instructions: Bake stale bread with custard mixture for a rich dessert.

name: Paneer Bhurji Sandwich
instructions: Crumble leftover paneer, mix with spices, and use as sandwich filling.

name: Vegetable Cutlets
instructions: Mash vegetables, mix with binders like breadcrumbs or poha, and shallow fry.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend overripe fruits with yogurt or milk for a quick smoothie.
